author: 1monster90
body:
You shouldn't invest money you can't afford to lose. Personally, money in the stock market is money I am considering nonexistent until 2045.   
Don't be greedy but don't be cynical either. I think you could really benefit from making a list of interesting stocks. And from that list try to pick at least 10 stocks that you find promising and buy. Even if it's just 1 share (that way you will be focused on these companies, it's not so much to make a profit than making yourself focus and research these companies. I find it easier to focus on stocks I have at least one share with that stocks I don't own at all).  


Here is my list of shares I'm watching carefully, feel free to research it.  
MSFT, V, MA, NKE, NTDOY, LOGI, SPXL, TQQQ, DOCU,  TRIP, ALGN, F, GME, APPL, NFLX, SBUX, LUV, HS, AMZN, AAL, TMUS, PG,  INTC, QCOM, PYPL, T, ATVI, RSG, FDM, AXP, CSCO, TGT, PLSE, TROW, ORCL,  FDX, CUBE, BABA, CTAS, ALK, JNJ, LLY, CB, NEE, FANG, GAMR, TWLO, TNA,  LABU, FAS, CTRE, PEP, EBAY, DFS, GE, SNQP, MS, RF, AMG, HIG, BR, BEN,  ZNGA, COR, WWE, WYNN, VT, VTI, ELY, ADBE, SQ, TWTR, CVS, CRSP, QQ, NDLS,  WU, MTRX, PUTW, TECL, GM, NYMT, MU and NDAQ .

author: NationalMarsupial7
body:
Micron is actually beyond fucked. Micron WILL begin losing market share in 2021, likely priced in now. It’s already the most “discounted” semiconductor stock, and for good reason. 

Micron sells two kinds of memory: NAND and DRAM. Both of these memories have spot prices that swing day to day just like the prices of commodities (corn, crude oil, gold, etc...). There have been crashes in the DRAM/NAND price because of its long lead time to create the technology (10 week min) leading to slow agility for makers/sellers in terms of responding to supply and demand fluctuations. 

And supply is about to get fucked by the Chinese. New semiconductor company in China is making massive leaps in technology faster than expected. Micron says they’ll be safe from Chinese NAND through 2021. This is wishful thinking, new estimates have expected Chinese nand output up 100% over previous projections. 

https://semianalysis.com/the-impending-chinese-nand-apocalypse/amp/

author: WSBankrupt
body:
5G is going to be pushed hard.  I've done a fair bit of research on tickers that are worthwhile if it blows up as much as I think it will.  The implementation of these mesh networks could be huge for many companies.

Network Implementation - NOK and ERIC (Would grab NOK asap)

Base Station Chipsets - MRVL

Phone Semis - QCOM

Industrial + Vehicle Semis - NXPI

Shared Comms Infrastructure - AMT

Multi Discipline - INTC

&#x200B;

I hold positions (leaps or stonks in almost all of the above)
